tool_description:
Welcome to the Pregnancy Calculator API. This API provides endpoints for calculating Fertility Window, Pregnancy Due Date, Pregnancy Week, and Pregnancy Weight Recommendation. With this API, you can easily integrate these calculations into your applications, websites, or any other projects.

Error Handling

The API uses standard HTTP status codes to indicate the success or failure of a request. In case of an error, the response will contain an error message in JSON format. The HTTP status cod...
name: Pregnancy Calculator API
title: Pregnancy Calculator API

api_list.name: Pregnancy Weight Recommendation - GET
api_list.description: This endpoint that accepts a GET request to calculate the recommended weight during pregnancy based on the user's pre-pregnancy weight, height, and current gestational age.

required_parameters.name: pre_pregnancy_weight
required_parameters.description: The user's pre-pregnancy weight in kilograms (**kg**).

api_list.name: Fertility Window - GET
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts a GET request to calculate the fertility window.

required_parameters.name: cycle_length
required_parameters.description: The length of the menstrual cycle in days.

required_parameters.name: menstrual_date
required_parameters.description: The date of the first day of the last menstrual period in the format '**YYYY-MM-DD**'.

api_list.name: Conception Date.
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the current week of pregnancy based on the conception date.

required_parameters.name: conception_date
required_parameters.description: The date of conception in the format '**YYYY-MM-DD**'

api_list.name: Last Menstrual Period (LMP).
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the current week of pregnancy based on the Last Menstrual Period (LMP).

required_parameters.name: cycle_length
required_parameters.description: The average length of the user's menstrual cycle in days.

required_parameters.name: last_period_date
required_parameters.description: The date of the user's last menstrual period in the format '**YYYY-MM-DD**'.

api_list.name: Conception Date
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the estimated due date based on the user's conception date.

required_parameters.name: conception_date
required_parameters.description: The date of conception in the format '**YYYY-MM-DD**'

api_list.name: Last Menstrual Period (LMP)
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the estimated due date based on the user's last menstrual period (LMP)

required_parameters.name: cycle_length
required_parameters.description: The average length of the user's menstrual cycle in days.

required_parameters.name: last_period_date
required_parameters.description: The date of the user's last menstrual period in the format '**YYYY-MM-DD**'.
